titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States Trade Representative should commence negotiations to enter into a bilateral trade agreement with Taiwan.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States Trade Representative should commence negotiations to enter into a bilateral trade agreement with Taiwan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Encourages the United States Trade Representative to commence negotiations to enter into a bilateral trade agreement with Taiwan.
